titles.title: To amend chapter 89 of title 5, United States Code, to make available to Federal employees the option of obtaining health benefits coverage for dependent parents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/7/2005--Introduced. Allows Federal employees the option of enrolling in an approved health benefits plan for "self and extended family" which includes coverage of a dependent parent.
